评论详情: This is a very versatile jacket… lovely color, easy going style, and wearable with a variety of outfits. Coinciding, I also own a handbag that is a perfect match for it!!

I liked the material - it wasn't like the other "sweatshirt" ones.
The jacket is thin but perfect for fall weather.  Color was as shown.  Very nice.
Comfy, light weight, just the right pop with jeans, etc. This grandma loved it.

Overall, I really like this jacket. It has a nice style and is lightweight enough for the mild winters we get in the south. It is a roomy true-to-size. I usually wear an 18/20US and ordered an XL and it fits comfortably. I will definitely be wearing it this winter.  All that said, I have one big issue. The jacket is much shorter than it look in the pictures, and I am short at 5'4. The jacket hits right at my waist rather than the hip as shown. It is disappointing because I was hoping for something longer. If I had had a specific outfit in mind I would have been extremely annoyed at just how different it looks as a shorter jacket.  One last note, when I took it out of the package, the fabric felt stiff and had a chemically smell. I washed with like items on a normal cycle and dried on medium heat and the smell was gone and the fabric feels much softer. I did not take off any stars for this but it is Wirth noting in case someone wants to buy it and wear it right away. It will not be a pleasant experience. On the positive side, it washed well and had no noticeable shrinkage.

I wasn’t sure this would be a good look on me at 57, but every time I wear it out I get many compliments on it!The fit is perfect, so true to size, a bit of wiggle room, but not oversized.  The quality of this jacket is amazing, no wonky seams or loose threads.  It washed and dried very nicely and the black didn’t bleed onto the white.This is the perfect fall jacket that’s trendy but won’t make you look like a teenager.  I highly recommend this one!
Well made jacket.  I ordered an XL but it is big.  I should have ordered a large for a better fit.  The fabric is nice and soft.
Very cute. Versatile with different types of outfits. True to size.

I ordered this bomber jacket in the pink color and I love it. The pink is a very pretty blush color, perfect for fall. The jacket is thinner than I expected, but again will be perfect in the fall here in Texas. It is a great layering jacket and fit me true to size. Held up great in the washer as well.
This jacket is adorable and run true to size. It's a light weight and comfortable jacket. It seems the be grata quality and help up great when washing it. I definitely recommend this item!!
I purchased the black and one jacket.  I would like it even more if the buttons were black instead of silver.  I'm a size 6 and ordered a large.

I absolutely love this jacket, it’s my new favorite. The materials and stitching are high quality. The fit is perfect, true to size and extremely flattering. It’s a nice, lightweight jacket. I highly recommend.

Although this jacket can get a couple wrinkles if you let it lie the wrong way, once you put the jacket on, they easily fall out. The jacket fit perfectly for me however it's more form fitting than baggy in the size I ordered. But, it's nice when you are a double X and something fits you the way it fits the model who is wearing the item you order-  with a slight baggy appearence, but for the most part, form fitting (if you look at the Amazon model and agree with me that's how the jacket fits her). I love wearing this jacket- it is even appropriate for some colder summer nights in Ohio (as well as spring, autumn and warmer winter days and nights) and I feel that it matches jeans and yoga pants well (at least when I wear them ;). Please see my video review of this item for more information and know that I really enjoy wearing this jacket and love it as a part of my wardrobe!

This is really cute and good quality for the money. Fit as expected.  But you should understand it is a very light jacket.  If you live in the south like I do, you will wear it a lot for warmer afternoons. But it will not work for winter!

评论概述: Nice looking and pretty well made light jacket!
评论详情: I got this jacket for my daughter, and I'm quite pleased with it!  It's a perfect weight for fall---light but not too light.  It has a classic look, like a school jacket, and it is well sized and fits her well in her usual size.  It's well made---not made for the ages, but for the price point, nicely done, and I feel sure it will last a few seasons well.  The snaps stay snapped well, and there are a couple nice pockets.  We are quite pleased with this!

This lightweight bomber jacket is a nice addition to my wardrobe for those crisp, cool days in spring or fall does sport look is very nice and flattering, making it a versatile piece that pairs well with various outfits. I also find it to be a fantastic option for summer, especially when I’m heading into restaurants or taking the train where the air conditioning can be quite chilly. The jacket provides just the right amount of warm without filling bulky.

I got this since I like the beige color, I was surprised this fit really good on me. It usually it is hard to find things online to fit good but this did, for me that is a plus. It is light weight and unlined so more of a jacket for cooler weather. It looks good with any outfit you pair it with. It even has snaps to keep it closed, the only down side is no pockets, that would have been another plus. I like this and have already been using it since we are hot/cold here in Iowa so this works well. I would recommend this for a light weight fall jacket. It matched the description in the ad.

This Casual Striped Button Down Coat Lightweight Short Bomber Jacket is not really a jacket but more of a layering piece. The fabric is thin and shirt like.
